1460770.name: Boring Game
1460770.description:
This saying cannot apply in your clinic, and the only person responsible for that is you!
Remember about careful sterilization of your tools, and make sure you used the right anaesthetics for the job. Remember, you never get a second chance to make a good first impression.





Before you can afford a bigger clinic you’ll have to work for it. The more satisfied customers, the faster you’ll earn it. Purchase modern tools and expand the capabilities of your current workplace. Oh and don’t get overwhelmed by the popularity of your services, reaching the top requires sacrifice!






It’s time to start the procedure! Doesn’t matter if it’s just a simple checkup or a complicated surgery of root canal treatment, you gotta do your absolute best. The patient’s comfort and more importantly, his health is on the line. Every slip of your hand or unprofessional approach will cost you your popularity, and without it, you won’t go too far.



The tricks of the trade / In and outs of the profession.

All the treatments you’ll be performing in the game are based on real simulations.
Thanks to the Boring Game, you’ll not only get a chance to feel like a dentist but also understand and learn more about how a real dental clinic function and how to perform each and every procedure.


ATTENTION - 9 out of 10 dentists recommend this game (the rest of them are probably not real gamers)
